text: “Atrivim e uari, nɨ uan akɨnafariba osirir gumazibav kemeghtɨ, me Babilonɨn akɨnafaribar aven Atrivim Sairus mɨkemezir akar kam bagh deragh rui. Nɨ ti fogham, Atrivim Sairus a guizbangɨra Godɨn Dɨpenim uam an ingarasa me mɨkeme. Egh nɨ gɨn akam amadagh deragh e mɨkɨm suam, me dɨpenir kam uam an ingaram, o puvatɨgham.”
